# agents

The Agents module for creating and managing LLM agents.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/index" symbolName="Agent" /> Agent

Agent class for generating responses using LLMs with tools.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/index" symbolName="AsyncAgent" /> AsyncAgent

Asynchronous agent class for generating responses using LLMs with tools.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/index" symbolName="AsyncStructuredAgent" /> AsyncStructuredAgent

Asynchronous structured agent class for generating structured responses using LLMs with tools.

## <ApiType type="Module" path="agents/index" symbolName="agent" /> agent

The `Agent` class for LLM agents.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/index" symbolName="StructuredAgent" /> StructuredAgent

Structured agent class for generating structured responses using LLMs with tools.

## <ApiType type="Module" path="agents/index" symbolName="async_agent" /> async_agent

The `AsyncAgent` module for creating and managing asynchronous LLM agents.

## <ApiType type="Module" path="agents/index" symbolName="structured_agent" /> structured_agent

The `StructuredAgent` module for creating agents with structured responses.

## <ApiType type="Module" path="agents/index" symbolName="decorator" /> decorator

The `llm.agent` decorator for turning a function into an agent.

## <ApiType type="Module" path="agents/index" symbolName="base_structured_agent" /> base_structured_agent

The `BaseStructuredAgent` class for structured LLM agents.

## <ApiType type="Module" path="agents/index" symbolName="base_agent" /> base_agent

The `BaseAgent` class for LLM agents.

## <ApiType type="Module" path="agents/index" symbolName="async_structured_agent" /> async_structured_agent

The `AsyncStructuredAgent` module for creating async agents with structured responses.
